testimonials.title: What our clients say about us
testimonials.description: Discover how we turn complex challenges into elegant, user-centered solutions.

items.body: Tucupy transformed our outdated e-commerce platform into a modern, scalable solution in just 8 weeks. The performance improvements alone increased our conversion rate by 35%.
Their team's expertise in cloud architecture saved us thousands in monthly infrastructure costs while improving our system reliability. We now have 99.9% uptime.
The API integration was flawless. They delivered a complex multi-vendor marketplace ahead of schedule with zero critical bugs at launch.
Working with Tucupy felt like having an extended tech team. They understood our business needs and translated them perfectly into technical solutions.
They rebuilt our entire mobile app from scratch using React Native. The result? A single codebase that works perfectly on both iOS and Android, cutting our maintenance costs by 60%.
The team's proactive approach to security helped us pass our SOC 2 audit on the first attempt. They think about problems before they become problems.
Our platform now handles 10x the traffic with the same infrastructure. The optimization work they did was incredible - response times improved by 70%.
Tucupy didn't just build what we asked for - they challenged our assumptions and delivered something better. Our users love the new interface.
From MVP to Series A, they've been our technical partners. They scale with us, adapting quickly to our changing needs without missing a beat.

hero.title: We build reliable software with speed and care
hero.description: We're a hands-on team that partners with ambitious companies to ship products that scale. Small, senior squads. Clear ownership. Zero drama—just great software.

principles.title: How we make software that lasts
principles.description: These principles guide how we think, build, and collaborate—with our clients and with each other.

items.title: Think Clearly
items.description: Simple solutions beat complex ones. We design for clarity first.

items.title: Small, Senior Teams
items.description: Experienced squads ship faster, with fewer handoffs and more ownership.

items.title: Care Deeply
items.description: We obsess over quality and outcomes that matter for our clients.

items.title: Raise the Bar
items.description: We review, iterate, and continuously improve how we build and deliver.

items.title: Bias to Ship
items.description: Momentum compounds. We deliver value early and often, then refine.

items.title: Own the Outcome
items.description: We operate like owners and measure success by client impact.

howWeWork.title: Craftsmanship meets speed
howWeWork.description: We favor small, senior teams that move quickly and own outcomes end to end. Fewer handoffs, sharper thinking, faster delivery.

items.title: In-Person by Design
items.description: Co-located teamwork accelerates decisions and unlocks creative flow.

items.title: Engineering Rigor
items.description: Clean abstractions, thoughtful architecture, and reliable delivery.

items.title: Transparent Comms
items.description: Clear weekly updates, demos, and a shared roadmap—no black boxes.

items.title: Results > Hours
items.description: We optimize for outcomes, not timesheets. Quality and speed together.

location.title: Built in-office for speed and focus
location.description: We're fully in-person. It's how we make faster decisions, build tighter feedback loops, and ship with confidence.

whatWeDo.title: What we do
whatWeDo.description: Product strategy, web & platform engineering, cloud, and end‑to‑end delivery.

whoWeHelp.title: Who we help
whoWeHelp.description: Startups shipping MVPs and companies scaling to millions of users.

hero.title: We're on a mission to deliver exceptional software solutions
hero.description: Explore career opportunities and join our team of experts shaping the future of technology.

values.title: What drives us forward
values.description: Our values shape everything we do, from how we work together to how we serve our clients.

items.title: Innovation First
items.description: We embrace cutting-edge technologies and creative problem-solving to deliver exceptional solutions.

items.title: Collaborative Spirit
items.description: Success comes from working together, sharing knowledge, and supporting each other's growth.

items.title: Client-Centered
items.description: We're passionate about understanding and exceeding our clients' expectations in every project.

items.title: Excellence Always
items.description: We hold ourselves to the highest standards, constantly pushing boundaries to deliver quality.

items.title: Fast Execution
items.description: We move with purpose and precision, delivering results quickly without compromising quality.

items.title: Ownership Mindset
items.description: We seek people who treat the business as their own and are passionate about growing with us.

culture.title: In-person collaboration, exceptional results
culture.description: We work fully in-person because we believe the best ideas, strongest relationships, and fastest execution happen when talented people work side by side. Our office is where innovation thrives.

items.title: 100% In-Person Team
items.description: We work together in our office every day. This creates deeper connections, faster decision-making, and the energy that drives breakthrough solutions.

items.title: Results-Focused
items.description: We measure success by outcomes, not hours. Deliver exceptional results and manage your time as you see fit. We trust you to do what's needed.

items.title: Grow With Us
items.description: We're looking for people who see themselves as owners, not employees. Your success is our success, and we'll grow together.

items.title: Flexible Schedule
items.description: While we work in-person, we offer flexibility in your daily schedule. Early bird or night owl, structure your day to maximize your productivity.

benefits.title: Compensation that matches your impact
benefits.description: We believe in rewarding talent fairly and providing the essentials you need to succeed.

items.title: Competitive Salary
items.description: Market-rate compensation that reflects your skills and experience. We pay what you're worth.

items.title: Equity Opportunity
items.description: For exceptional contributors who demonstrate ownership mindset, we offer equity participation to align long-term success.

items.title: Flexible Hours
items.description: Structure your workday around your peak productivity. We care about results, not when you clock in.

items.title: Premium Equipment
items.description: Top-tier hardware and all the software tools you need. No compromises on the tools of your trade.

items.title: Team Building
items.description: Regular team events, dinners, and celebrations. We work hard and celebrate our wins together.

items.title: Career Growth
items.description: Direct mentorship from leadership and clear paths for advancement. Your growth is our priority.
